official_title: A bill to provide that certain improvements in the Great Miami River, Ohio, shall not be subject to Federal review and approval.

summary.text: Declares that Federal prohibitions and provisions for review and approval shall not apply to certain improvements in the Great Miami River, Ohio.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain improvements in the Great Miami River, Ohio, shall not be subject to Federal review and approval.
